programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Lugar Para Retornar

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Voltando Para Casa

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Kazekage Se Mantm No Alto

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Jutsu De Selamento: Nove Drages Fantasmas!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Encontro Com Destino

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Crescimento De Naruto

programme.title: Por uns Dlares a Mais, (1965, Western)

programme.title: Valan - Vale dos Anjos, (2019, Crime)
programme.desc: O policial Peter investiga diversos desaparecimentos de jovens mulheres em um caso de rede de trfico sexual.

programme.title: O Prisioneiro, (2023, Crime)
programme.desc: Dylan deixou seu passado sombrio de crimes e encontrou o amor de sua vida, Maria. Agora ele trabalha como pescador em guas abertas, mas o diretor da priso local tem outros planos.

programme.title: Crimes Obscuros, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: O policial Tadek investiga um caso de assassinato no resolvido e encontra semelhanas do crime em um livro do artista polons Krystov Kozlow. Ele comea a investigar a vida do escritor e da sua namorada, uma mulher misteriosa que trabalha num sex club.

programme.title: Em rota de coliso, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Um grupo de terroristas russos sequestra um avio americano e planeja derrub-lo em uma usina nuclear perto de Washington D.C. Cabe tripulao e aos passageiros do voo, a misso de impedi-los antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua, (2022, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Aps os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de gua na Terra, uma nave enviada at Tit, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a misso de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivncia, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma histria real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: Ataque Colina 400, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Em 1944, durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, o 2 Batalho do exrcito americano recebe a misso de cercar a cidade alem de Bergstein e a Colina 400, um local altamente estratgico.

programme.title: Assassinato no Expresso do Inferno, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: Os passageiros de um trem so surpreendidos por um assalto que termina em assassinato.

programme.title: Assassinos de Aluguel, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Inspirado na histria real de um escndalo que envolveu presidirios sendo liberados por um dia para trabalharem como assassinos de aluguel para polticos corruptos.

programme.title: A Maldio do Titanic, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: 110 anos aps um dos maiores desastres da histria, Titanic III faz sua viagem inaugural at os destroos do navio original. Mas foras sombrias das profundezas do oceano aterrorizam os tripulantes e ameaam repetir a histria.

programme.title: Batalha dos Zumbis, (2019, Zombies)
programme.desc: Alguns anos depois do caos econmico na Crocia, o mundo mudou e agora a gua rara e valiosa, e uma epidemia zumbi assola a Europa. O bon vivant Mico finalmente conhece sua estrela de cinema favorita, mas eles tero que lutar juntos para sobreviver.

programme.title: Velocipastor, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Depois de perder seus pais, um padre viaja para a China, onde herda uma habilidade misteriosa que lhe permite se tornar um dinossauro. Horrorizado com esse novo poder, uma prostituta o convence a us-lo para combater o crime.

programme.title: V/H/S - Viral, (2012, Zombies)
programme.desc: Em busca da fama na internet, um grupo de adolescentes comea a filmar fenmenos estranhos. Mas eles no sabem que s conseguiro a ateno desejada quando forem protagonistas de acontecimentos sobrenaturais e sangrentos.

programme.title: O Trevo Vermelho, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Um duende malvado que foi aprisionado nas razes de um velho carvalho acidentalmente solto no Dia de So Patrcio. Uma vez livre, ele realiza sua vingana sangrenta contra as pessoas que originalmente o aprisionaram.

programme.title: Maldita Aranha Assassina, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: A cidade de Los Angeles tem um grande problema pela frente. Uma aranha gigante acaba de escapar de um laboratrio e est aterrorizando os moradores da cidade.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos, (1985, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: Enquanto o mundo tomado por zumbis, um grupo de cientistas e militares abrigados em um bunker subterrneo na Flrida devem determinar como devem lidar com a horda de mortos-vivos e com as diferenas entre os sobreviventes.

programme.title: V/H/S, (2012, Horror)

programme.title: Thor: Deus do Trovo, (2022, Adventure)

programme.title: Retroceder Nunca, Render-se Jamais, (1986, Action)

programme.title: Era uma vez na China e na Amrica, (1997, Action)

programme.title: The Raven, (1963, Horror)
programme.desc: The sorcerer Craven learns from fellow magician Dr. Bedlo that his supposedly dead wife is alive and living at the castle of master sorcerer Dr. Scarabus.

programme.title: The Pit and the Pendulum, (1961, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: Vincent Price slowly goes crazy because he thinks his wife was buried alive (a plot between his wife and her lover to get his money). Now totally insane, he starts to murder.

programme.title: Tower of London, (1962, Horror)
programme.desc: Vincent Price shines as Richard of Gloucester, the ambitious brother to a dying king. When he is overlooked to take the throne, he goes on a murderous rampage...only for the ghosts of those he has slain to return from the grave and haunt him!

programme.title: Sweet Smell of Success, (1957, Crime)
programme.desc: A columnist and a press agent tear into the maelstrom of midtown Manhattan's night creatures in a sinister game that involves money, power and ultimately survival.

programme.title: The Ten Commandments, (1956, Drama)

programme.title: Stagecoach, (1939, Western)
programme.desc: Dallas is a woman with a past who has been driven out of town by the high-minded ladies of the community. Lucy Mallory is the wife of a cavalry officer stationed in Lordsburg, and she's determined to be with him.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: Donovan's Reef, (1963, Comedy)

programme.desc: From director Michael Bay, 13 HOURS is the gripping true story of six elite ex-military operators assigned to protect the CIA who fought back against overwhelming odds when terrorists attacked a U.S. diplomatic compound on September 11, 2012.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible, (1996, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II, (2000, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III, (2006, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt hurdles into spectacular new adventures from Rome to Shanghai as he races to rescue a captured agent and stop Davian from eliminating his next target, Ethans wife.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol, (2011, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Agent Ethan Hunt and his elite team go underground after a bombing implicates them as terrorists. While trying to clear their name, the team uncovers a plot to start a nuclear war.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation, (2018, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible, (1996, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II, (2000, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw, (1970, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: A young woman inherits an isolated mansion from a distant relative, but an unspeakable horror awaits her in the mansion's dank cellars.

programme.title: Ginger Snaps, (2001, Horror)
programme.desc: The Craft meets The Howling in this edgy, modern werewolf tale in which a teenage girl must choose between saving herself and joining her sister in an otherworldly existence.

programme.title: The Dark Half, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: A writer undergoes an operation that reveals a twin in his brain. He begins a double writing life, using a pseudonym for his disreputable best-sellers. When the pseudonym discovers he is to be eradicated, he goes on a murderous rampage.

programme.title: Disturbing Behavior, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: When the Clark Family moves from Chicago to Cradle Bay, Steve is cautioned by Gavin Strick about the separating factions at the local high school, where the Blue Ribbons, a club of robotic perfect students, rule.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths, an offbeat group of scary movie fans become the target of a masked killer in this smash-hit thriller from legendary director Wes Craven (A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET) that breathed new life into the horror genre.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: While away at college, Sidney Prescott thought she'd finally put the terror behind her...until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel in which no one is safe, or beyond suspicion.

programme.title: Scream 3, (2000, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: The first film set the rules. In the sequel, the stakes got higher. In the third installment of the hit franchise SCREAM, all bets are off. It's an insidious game of horror movie mayhem with surprising twists and turns.

programme.title: Scream 4, (2011, Slashers and Serial Killers)

programme.desc: Aizawa figures out what's going on and tells Near, who already knows about the notes.

programme.title: Death Note: Malice

programme.desc: After losing to D'Arby, Joseph and Polnareff have their souls taken. In order to have their souls returned, Jotaro shows off Star Platinum's powers before beginning a match with D'Arby, warning him that cheating won't work.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Hol Horse and Mondatta, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Hol Horse and Mondatta, Part 2
programme.desc: Following Mondatta's prediction, Hol Horse sticks his fingers into Polnareff's nose, but he doesn't know what to do from there. Making matters worse, Jotaro and the others show up in search of Polnareff, forcing Hol Horse into a tough spot.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 1
programme.desc: Jotaro and his friends continue to search for DIO's mansion in Cairo. Following Avdol's advice, they have a beggar look for the mansion and wait. Meanwhile, Iggy, wandering the city alone, is confronted by two large dogs.
programme.sub-title: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 2
programme.desc: Iggy ends up in a battle to the death in the sewers against Pet Shop, the falcon that guards DIO's mansion. Despite being injured, Iggy runs to the river in an attempt to escape, but he may have underestimated Pet Shop's abilities.
programme.sub-title: The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Player, Part 1
programme.desc: Though purchased dearly with Iggy's injury, Jotaro and his group finally have the location of DIO's palace. Waiting for them where they find the butler, Darby Younger, brother of the gambler they previously defeated.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: D'Arby the Player, Part 2
programme.desc: The battle for souls with D'Arby continues. Kakyoin challenges D'Arby to a racing game but ends up losing both the race and his soul. Before Joseph really has time to react, Jotaro picks the next game.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 1
programme.desc: The baseball game with D'Arby continues within DIO's mansion. For some reason, Jotaro starts telling D'Arby what pitches he'll be throwing. D'Arby finds Jotaro's actions strange, but still believes he has the upper hand because of his Stand's abilities.
programme.sub-title: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 2
programme.desc: After a long, hard journey, the group is suddenly faced with saying goodbye to a friend. Polnareff can't control his emotions and starts brandishing his sword toward an unseen enemy with very little success.
programme.sub-title: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 3
programme.desc: Polnareff is pushed to his limits by Cool Ice's merciless attacks. As he awaits death, the dying Iggy manages to save him at the last minute. Polnareff then stabs Cool Ice in the head. Despite showing resilience to the attacks so far.
programme.sub-title: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 3

programme.desc: Light gives Kiyomi the order to finish off Near.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Hitman Team
programme.desc: After an encounter with the Hitman Teams Formaggio, Narancia is left wondering why the world is quickly transforming around him. Narancia hunts down his assailant with a hail of bullets as Formaggio tries to understand his attackers tracking skills.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Narancia is unshakable as he uses firepower and CO2 detection to survive Formaggios body-shrinking attack. Even beneath a spiders fangs inside Formaggios bottle, Narancia reveals not Trishs whereabouts but the bullet holes his Stand has left behind.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Giorno, Abbacchio and Fugo travel to Pompeii to find a hidden key pivotal in their protection of Trish. Facing the trio, however, is more than the lonely remains of ancient Roman villas and colonnades. Fugo spots an odd figure in an even stranger mirror.
programme.sub-title: The Second Mission From the Boss

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Illuso has pulled Fugo into his mirror world as Abbacchio rushes to retrieve the key, despite Giornos stern advice. But Abbacchio cannot escape a similar fate, leaving him and later Giorno to resort to self-mutilation in favor of death by laceration.

programme.title: The Reading, (2023, Thriller)
programme.desc: After a deadly home invasion, Emma (Mo'Nique Hicks) copes by writing a book, but when a young psychic and her team perform a reading in her home, a new terror is unleashed.

programme.title: The Brother From Another Planet, (1984, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A mute alien with the appearance of a black human is chased by outer-space bounty hunters through the streets of Harlem.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night, (1967, Crime)
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier and Rod Steiger (who won a Best Actor Oscar for his performance) shine in this classic mystery-thriller that took home five Academy Awards, including Best Picture and Best Adapted Screenplay. Lee Grant and Warren Oates also star.

programme.title: They Call Me Mister Tibbs!, (1970, Thriller)
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier, as Detective Virgil Tibbs, battles another puzzling murder in San Francisco in this exciting sequel with compelling performances from Martin Landau and Barbara McNair and music by Quincy Jones.

programme.title: The Organization, (1971, Action)
programme.desc: The dangerous world of international heroin trafficking is exposed in this elaborate and suspenseful crime thriller which reprises Sidney Poitier's role as Lt. Virgil Tibbs.

programme.title: Cooley High, (1975, Comedy)
programme.desc: Set in 1964 Chicago, "Cooley High" is a slice-of-life tale of two high school students--best friends--coping with the challenges of everyday life and growing up in the shadows of the housing projects. Glynn Turman and Laurence-Hilton Jacobs star.

programme.title: Beat Street, (1984, Musical)
programme.desc: Urban ghetto kids from the South Bronx find creative outlets in painting graffiti, breakdancing, rapping, and developing new disco D.J. routines.

programme.title: Selma, (2014, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: From the Oscar-winning producers of 12 Years a Slave comes a powerful true story starring David Oyelewo and Oprah Winfrey. Facing violent opposition, Martin Luther King, Jr., led a historic march from Selma to Montgomery, changing the world forever.

programme.title: Dragon, (2013, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: Liu Jin-xi (Donnie Yen) is a village craftsman whose quiet life is irrevocably shattered by the arrival of two notorious gangsters in the local general store.

programme.title: Special ID, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: An undercover cop (Donnie Yen) infiltrates one of China's most ruthless crime syndicates. He must risk everything to protect his family and his life after the boss (Collin Chou) vows to find and kill every traitor in his organization.

programme.title: Iceman, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Four hundred years after being frozen in time, a Ming Dynasty palace guard and his three associates are thawed and left to adjust to the modern-day.

programme.title: Iceman: The Time Traveler, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: In the action-packed second chapter of the Iceman saga, Ying's heroic fight to rewrite history and reclaim his honor continues but those he trusts most may be leading into a deadly trap.

programme.title: Kung Fu Killer, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Released from prison, a kung-fu expert (Donnie Yen) tries to help the police find a vicious serial killer (Wang Baoqiang) who targets martial-arts masters.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon, (2017, Action)

programme.title: Big Brother, (2018, Action)

programme.title: Fist of Fury, (1972, Action)

programme.title: Orochimaru and Kabuto use a summoning jutsu to call forth a giant snake. Still drugged and unable to fully use his chakra, Jiraiya summons little Gamakichi.

programme.title: Narutos ninja way is to never go back on his word. Naruto is seriously injured by Kabuto and hovers on the verge of death.

programme.title: Jiraiya, Tsunade and Orochimaru all release their summoning jutsu. And a fierce battle begins.

programme.title: Tsunade, Naruto, and the others start heading back to the Leaf Village where Tsunade will formally become the Fifth Hokage. At Tsunade's urging, they stop at a town with hot springs.

programme.title: Naruto asks Tsunade to heal Sasuke and Lee before she is installed as the Hokage. After examining Lee, she tells him to find a path other than that of a shinobi.

programme.title: After being advised by Tsunade to quit the path of the shinobi, Lee recalls his first meeting with his teacher Guy.

programme.title: Naruto and his two squadmates have always wanted to see what Kakashi looks like under his mask. The three do whatever they can to reveal his whole face.

programme.title: Naruto and his squad manage to catch up to Idate, only to find him hurt and unconscious with Aoi nearby.

programme.title: Despite interference from Aoi, Idate continues his run. Idate still trusts no one, and its revealed that during the Chunin Exams, Idates older brother was the proctor who posed the tenth question.

programme.title: Boss Jirocho waits, confident that Idate will win. But Aoi, the ninja sent by the Wagarashi clan, stands in the way.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Assuming that the Leaf squad could never get past Jirobo, the remaining Sound ninja dont bother to lay traps along the way.

programme.title: Four Brothers, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: Dragged Across Concrete, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two embittered police detectives (Mel Gibson and Vince Vaughn) descend into the criminal underworld and find more than they wanted waiting in the shadows.

programme.title: Set It Off, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: Jada Pinkett, Queen Latifah, Vivica A. Fox and Kimberly Elise star as four African American women living in a Los Angeles housing project who--pushed to the edge--resort to violence to escape poverty.

programme.title: Four Brothers, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)

programme.title: Set It Off, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: Jada Pinkett, Queen Latifah, Vivica A. Fox and Kimberly Elise star as four African American women living in a Los Angeles housing project who--pushed to the edge--resort to violence to escape poverty.

programme.desc: An undercover cop infiltrates a gang of thieves who plan to rob a jewelry store.

programme.desc: When three close friends escape from Hong Kong to war-time Saigon to start a criminal's life, they all go through a harrowing experience which totally shatters their lives and their friendship forever.

programme.desc: A reforming ex-gangster tries to reconcile with his estranged policeman brother, but the ties to his former gang are difficult to break.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow II [English Subtitled], (1987, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: A restauranteur teams up with a police officer and his ex-con brother to avenge the death of a friend's daughter.

programme.desc: A man travels from China to Vietnam, on the brink of war with America, to retrieve his uncle and cousin but find complications when he falls in love with a female gangster with a dangerous ex.

programme.title: The Killer [English Subtitled], (1989, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: A disillusioned assassin accepts one last hit in hopes of using his earnings to restore vision to a singer he accidentally blinded.

programme.desc: A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.

programme.title: Hot Summer Nights, (2018, Crime)
programme.desc: An awkward teenager gets in over his head dealing drugs while falling for his business partner's enigmatic sister during one scorching summer in Cape Cod, Massachusetts.

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man (Director's Cut), (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Dr. Lawrence Angelo (Pierce Brosnan) is a brilliant scientist obsessed with perfecting virtual reality software. When his experiments on animals fail, he finds the ideal substitute Jobe Smith (Jeff Fahey), a slow-witted gardener.

programme.title: No Escape, (1994, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A soldier convicted of murdering his commanding officer is dumped on a prison island and left to fend for himself.

programme.desc: With his life points on the line, Yusei must figure out a way to take down Ghost's Meklord Emperor Wisel before Wisel's special ability throws his game and his runner into a tailspin.

programme.desc: When Crow is asked to convince an old friend of Martha's to move into her retirement home, Crow decides to tackle the task by challenging the old man to a trash-talking junkyard duel. Can Crow convince the old man to relocate?

programme.title: The wind starts to go out of Luffy's sails as he fights an endless army of Biscuit Warriors! Meanwhile, the oldest two Vinsmoke brothers come home from a war to see their long-missing young brother Sanji.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The First and the Second Join! The Vinsmoke Family!

programme.title: Luffy starts to run out of steam as the Biscuit Warriors keep multiplying! If he can buy himself 10 minutes to recharge
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Benefactor's Life! Sanji and Owner Zeff!

programme.title: Luffy needs just 10 minutes to recharge! Nami comes to rescue with the help of the Homies! Meanwhile, Sanji learns the terrible truth of Germa's power - and his father's dark history!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Angry Sanji! The Secret of Germa 66!

programme.title: Nami challenges Cracker on her own! During the all-out fight, she loses her advantage and is close to defeat. Can Luffy bounce back in time? Meanwhile, Sanji's tragic childhood is made clear.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Past that He Let Go of! Vinsmoke Sanji!

programme.title: The terrible history of Sanji's family continue to unfold. From a rare moment of compassion, he is able to escape, only to face his father's cruelty before setting out on his own.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the East Blue! Sanji's Resolute Departure!

programme.title: Luffy is in an all-out, all-you-can-eat battle! As Cracker's endless stream of Biscuit Warriors marches on, Luffy's endless appetite is put to the test. Meanwhile, Reiju helps Sanji to straighten himself out before he meets his fiance.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle of Limits! Luffy and the Infinite Biscuits!

programme.title: Luffy needs to think fast in order to turn the battle in his favor - filled with biscuits, he debuts a new Gear Four attack that has lasting repercussions! Meanwhile, Chopper and Carrot find Sanji's reflection, but can they get a message to him in time?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Power of Satiety! A New Gear Four Form - Tank Man!

programme.title: Luffy finally catches up with Sanji! However, as a happy past plays before his eyes in which he, Sanji, and the crew deepened their bonds, a new page is turning in the history of the Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heartbreaking Duel! Luffy vs Sanji! - Part 1

programme.title: Sanji's journey with the crew looks to be coming to an end!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Heartbreaking Duel! Luffy vs Sanji! - Part 2

programme.title: Luffy makes a solemn promise to not move from his spot until Sanji returns to him. But as Mama's army advances, that promise may prove a costly one. Meanwhile, Sanji and the Vinsmokes come face to face with Big Mom and his bride-to-be Pudding!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Storm of Revenge! An Enraged Army Comes to Attack!

programme.title: Luffy stands his ground and waits for his friend to return! But the vengeful army washes over him - only a true friend can step in to turn the tide of battle! Meanwhile, Sanji and Pudding discuss their marriage - and come to a startling conclusion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Adventure! Sanji's Resolute Proposal!

programme.title: Luffy puts his all into battling Big Mom's vengeful army, however, their skills combined prove too formidable. Meanwhile, Sanji goes to Big Mom herself to bargain for the Straw Hats lives - with shocking results!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I'll Wait Here! Luffy vs. the Enraged Army!

programme.title: Chopper and Carrot are captured by Brulee and strung up for dinner! But Chopper sees a chance to free himself! Meanwhile, Brook and Pedro launch a plan to reach the Ponegliffs - a daring game of chance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Invading the Chateau! Reach the Road Ponegliff!

programme.title: Pekoms creates a diversion for Brook to set his plan into action. Meanwhile, Luffy continues to goad Big Mom into a fight, and Pudding begins to have stirrings of rebellion herself!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Fateful Confrontation! Luffy and Big Mom!

programme.title: Just when Luffy and Nami are in Big Mom's grasp, Pudding arrives, but with news that they aren't expecting - meanwhile Brook and Chopper both make headway getting out of their own jams!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shout of the Soul! Brook and Pedro's Lightning Operation!

programme.title: Sanji hopes his wedding with Pudding will solve the Straw Hat's predicament - but Pudding secretly plans to to avoid the marriage, sharing a secret with Luffy. Meanwhile, Brook comes face to face with Big Mom herself!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy tries desperately to free himself as the risk of his own well-being! Meanwhile, Chopper and Carrot continue to search the mirror universe, Brook squares off against Big Mom, and Pedro's past is revealed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The History of the Left Eye! Pedro vs. Baron Tamago!

programme.title: Luffy struggles to break himself free as Sanji falls deeper in love with the idea of marrying Pudding... But the mask falls off and the deadly charade of Big Mom is revealed as the depths of her treachery come to light!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Moist Cigarette! The Night Before Sanji's Wedding!

programme.title: Brook continues his all-out struggle against Big Mom, but his secret weapon might not be enough to save him! Meanwhile, an unexpected ally from the past comes to the rescue!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Undaunted Soul! Brook vs. Big Mom!

programme.title: Jimbei arrives on the scene and works to free Luffy and Nami! Meanwhile Sanji confronts his sister with the awful truth of Pudding, and she confides in him the powerful secret of their mother's undying love!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Brook finds himself totally at the whim of Big Mom, and comes face to face with her brutal love! Meanwhile, Pedro reveals his explosive plan to create a distraction!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To Reach Sanji! Luffy's Vengeful Hell-bent Dash!

programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Chateau in Turmoil! Luffy, to the Rendezvous!

programme.title: Brook hears Big Mom's plan firsthand as she shares her intentions with Pudding in front of him! Meanwhile, Big Mom's agents believe most of the Straw Hats to be under control, but doubt besets Montd'Or.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Deciding to Say Goodbye! Sanji and his Straw-Hat Bento!

programme.title: Nami and the others finally find Brook in the mirror dimension - but he's in the most inopportune of places! Can they challenge the sleeping Mama and rescue their friend? Meanwhile, Luffy is waylaid on his way back to the rendezvous!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Emperor Rolls Over! Rescue Brook Mission!

programme.title: Luffy puts up a valiant fight in order to keep his word to Sanji! But will he be able to last until Sanji arrives at the rendezvous? Meanwhile, Jimbei shares the awful truth about the wedding with the other Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rendezvous! Luffy, a One-on-One at His Limit!

programme.title: Sanji and Luffy meet finally - and while he is happy to feed Luffy to replenish his energy, Sanji's explanation of what actions he must take baffles Luffy! The crucial decision, to turn his back on his friends or his family, tears Sanji apart!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The newly reunited Luffy and Sanji hear from the rest of the Straw Hats in the mirror dimension! Then, Jimbei starts telling them about Capone "Gang" Bege and proposes a shocking plan to take down Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji Comes Back! Crash! The Tea Party from Hell!

programme.title: The Straw Hats put Jimbei's plan into action and approach Bege with the possibility of an alliance. But before they are granted an audience, they must make themselves presentable!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Secret Meeting! Luffy vs. the Fire Tank Pirates!

programme.title: The proposed alliance between the Straw Hats and Bege unfolds! A gaseous blast from the past, Gastino, a member of Bege's team, reveals the secret weapon that the team plans to use against the Emperor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Deadly Pact! Luffy & Bege's Allied Forces!

programme.title: Now, the assassination plan of Big Mom is all set and everyone starts preparing for the Tea Party. Montd'Or finds one of his crewmates, Bobbin the Disposer, dead, and suspects Sanji and Luffy of the crime.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Engages in a Secret Maneuver! The Wedding Full of Conspiracies Starts Soon!

programme.title: The day has arrived! Guests from the criminal underground pour in droves, but some have their own agendas to settle! Big Mom's sons, however, stand in their way and show them what they've got! Meanwhile, Luffy is preparing for his own plan!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Family Gets Together! The Hellish Tea Party Starts!

programme.title: Final preparations abound on all sides and multiple plots start to come together! But can Sanji keep his nerve and go through with the plan? Or will Pudding's beauty prove too enchanting?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Broken Couple! Sanji and Pudding Enter!

programme.title: All plans go into action as the moment of the wedding arrives - but as the veil is lifted on Pudding's grotesque face, all hell breaks loose and unexpected circumstances mean chaos at the altar! Meanwhile, Luffy charges in, adding to the mayhem!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Kiss! The Mission to Assassinate the Emperor Kicks Off!

programme.title: Redeno, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. Jason Statham um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grvida. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Agata Buzek, Jason Statham Diretor: Steven Knight

programme.title: Ruas Em Guerra, (2019)
programme.desc: 2019. Quando o implacvel Lord Rincon e sua gangue MS-13 recrutam Miguel, de 10 anos, para trabalhar como um de seus entregadores de drogas, Lucas, irmo mais velho de Miguel e que tambm trabalha para o bandido, est desesperado para manter o garoto seguro. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jean-Claude Van Damme, David Castaeda, Elijah Rodriguez, Nicholas Sean Johnny, Charlie MacGechan, Joana Metrass, Dean John-Wilson, Jim Caesar, Kerry Bennett, Uriel Emil Pollack Diretor: Lior Geller

programme.title: Dose dupla, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operao secreta acaba gerando resultados catastrficos. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Denzel Washington, Mark Wahlberg, Paula Patton Diretor: Baltasar Kormkur

programme.title: Cdigo de Honra, (2016)
programme.desc: 2016. Um ex-coronel das foras especiais se torna um vigilante que mata criminosos, enquanto um ex-colega quer det-lo. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal, James Russo, Louis Mandylor, Craig Sheffer, Griff Furst, Helena Mattsson, Rafael Petardi, R.D. Call, Michael Flynn, Ileana Huxley Diretor: Michael Winnick

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3, (2008)
programme.desc: 2008. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jason Statham, Robert Knepper, Natalya Rudakova, Franois Berland, Jeroen Krabb, Alex Kobold, David Atrakchi, Yann Sundberg, Eriq Ebouaney, David Kammenos Diretor: Olivier Megaton

programme.title: Caado, (2003)
programme.desc: 2003. Aaron Hallam um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vtimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Tommy Lee Jones, Connie Nielsen, Benicio Del Toro, Leslie Stefanson, John Finn, Jos Ziga, Ron Canada, Mark Pellegrino, Jenna Boyd, Aaron DeCone Diretor: William Friedkin

programme.title: Crash - No Limite, (2005)
programme.desc: 2005. Vidas em Los Angeles se cruzam em uma reflexo sobre racismo, perda e redeno. Gneros: Drama Elenco: Sandra Bullock, Don Cheadle, Matt Dillon, Michael Pea, Jennifer Esposito, Brendan Fraser, Nona Gaye, Terrence Howard, Ludacris, Thandiwe Newton Diretor: Paul Haggis

programme.title: Alvo Duplo, (2012)

programme.title: O Jri, (2003)

Gneros: Thriller Elenco: John Cusack, Gene Hackman, Dustin Hoffman, Rachel Weisz, Bruce Davison, Bruce McGill, Jeremy Piven, Nick Searcy, Stanley Anderson, Cliff Curtis Diretor: Gary Fleder

programme.title: Police Story: A Guerra das Drogas, (1985)
programme.desc: 1985. Ka Kui (Jackie Chan) prende um chefe do crime, mas a secretria o trai para libert-lo. Alm disso, ele lida com a namorada ciumenta. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jackie Chan, Brigitte Lin, Maggie Cheung, Yuen Chor, Bill Tung, Ken Tong Diretor: Jackie Chan, Chi-Hwa Chen

programme.title: Timecop: O Guardio do Tempo, (1994)
programme.desc: 1994. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Mia Sara, Ron Silver, Bruce McGill, Gloria Reuben, Scott Bellis, Jason Schombing, Scott Lawrence, Kenneth Welsh, Brent Woolsey Diretor: Peter Hyams

programme.title: O ltimo Guarda-Costas, (2010)

Gneros: Drama Elenco: Knightley, Keira, Farrell, Colin, Colin Farrell, Keira Knightley, Sanjeev Bhaskar, Stephen Graham, Ophelia Lovibond, Ray Winstone Diretor: William Monahan

programme.title: Um Colgio muito Maluco, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. Em uma escola secundria onde o uso de drogas aumentou, o diretor decide reduzir o uso de drogas realizando um teste de drogas em todos. Dois alunos com medo de dar positivo tm a ideia de que todos vo dar positivo para comer bolos com maconha. Gneros: Comedy Elenco: Adrien Brody, Colin Hanks Diretor: John Stalberg Jr.

programme.title: A Justiceira, (2014)
programme.desc: 2014. Ela uma professora antiquada, que inspira os alunos de uma cidadezinha. Mas eles no sabem que o passatempo favorito dela fazer justia com as prprias mos. Gneros: Comedy Elenco: Katie Holmes, James Badge Dale, Callan Mulvey Diretor: Karen Leigh Hopkins

programme.title: Meet The Spartans, (2008)
programme.desc: 2008. Pardia de "300" e outros filmes. O rei Lenidas e seu exrcito de 12 homens lutam contra Xerxes da Prsia para defender a liberdade de Esparta. Gneros: Comedy Elenco: Sean Maguire, Carmen Electra, Kevin Sorbo, Diedrich Bader, Ken Davitian Diretor: Jason Friedberg, Aaron Seltzer

programme.title: Duplex, (2003)
programme.desc: 2003. programme.title: Caindo na Estrada, (2000)

Gneros: Comedy Elenco: Breckin Meyer, Seann William Scott, Amy Smart, Rachel Blanchard, Fred Ward, Tom Green, Paulo Costanzo, D. J. Qualls Diretor: Todd Phillips

programme.desc: 1970. Um incndio atinge a Igreja de Saint James, devastando a congregao e o Pastor Dave, e a universidade vizinha usa a tragdia para tentar despejar a congregao de seu campus. Dave recorre a seu irmo, um advogado ateu, para tentar reerguer a igreja. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: Perseguindo o Assassino, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Detetive chega em casa em seu aniversrio de casamento e descobre que a esposa sofreu um acidente de carro. Sete meses depois, ela ainda est em coma e ele, incapaz de aceitar, se lana em uma caada por um serial killer que tem como alvo os idosos. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: Guerra Biolgica, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Wesley McClaren um imunologista aposentado da CIA, que leva uma vida tranquila com sua filha em uma fazenda em Montana. Quando uma arma biolgica acionada espalhando um vrus letal, ele se v forado a criar uma vacina. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: Sobibor, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O oficial sovitico Alexander Pechersky organiza uma revolta e uma fuga em massa dos prisioneiros de Sobibor, um campo de extermnio, em outubro de 1943. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: A Outra Face da Guerra, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Aps perder a me e a casa para as tropas invasoras alems, Artur encontra certo consolo em se juntar ao exrcito. No entanto, a guerra no nada como ele imaginou. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: A Histria de Esau, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Depois de anos ausente, escritor retorna casa da famlia em Israel para cuidar do pai doente. L ele enfrenta seu irmo mais novo amargurado, que assumiu toda a responsabilidade pela padaria da famlia e se casou com a mulher a quem ambos amavam. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: O Sonho de Mary Gray, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Jonathan, um homem infrtil, com medo de no ter nenhum filho com o nome da famlia, trama um plano: deixar que seu irmo Aaron engravide sua esposa, Mary Gray. Mas o plano d errado quando Mary Gray e Aaron comeam a se apaixonar. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: Bons pra Cachorro, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Almndega e Cassie, dois ces de estimao, precisam superar suas diferenas para evitar que ladres assaltem a casa dos seus donos. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: O Pequeno Gngster, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Rik Boskamp filho de um contador, e no aguenta mais sofrer bullying na escola. Ao assistir um filme sobre a mfia, tem uma ideia que parece ser brilhante. Fingir que seu pai um poderoso mafioso. Gneros: Drama

programme.desc: 2009. Os ninja da folha descobrem que naruto est dentro da besta de trs caudas.
